movie.title: A Hidden Life
movie.plot: The Austrian Franz Jägerstätter, a conscientious objector, refuses to fight for the Nazis in World War II.

events.title: Franz Jägerstätter is called to active duty
Franz Jägerstätter declares his conscientious objection, and is arrested
Franz Jägerstätter is sentenced to death
